content: simple rectangle shrug a design by iwona suchanek knoted thread the pattern for this cowl is the property of knoted thread and is for personal use only you can not distribute any part of this document by any means happy crocheting if you need support with this pattern please contact me through ig @knotedthread or at iwona s84@wp pl before you start *it is an intuitive pattern based on your own measurements and preferences *pattern contains some stitch guide *it is worked in row bottom up *shrug is designed as a loose fit *shrug can be made of any yarn using any hook *it is built out of two rectangles sewn together rectangles form front back and sleeves *sleeve part is about 3/4 length *it is easy to ajust to fit your needs *pattern is written in us terms abbreviation used chain s - chain s chain space - chain space double_crochet s - double_crochet s fo - fasten_off repeat - repeat single_crochet s - single_crochet s skip - skip slip_stitch- slip_stitch st s - stitch es 2 materials yarn - i suggest cotton for summer shrug any type you like for other seasons you will need about 300-800m of worsted weight yarn *i used drops loves you 9 in white color 50g - 125m/136yds - about 4 balls crochet hook - as recommended on the yarn chosen or slightly bigger i use 4mm hook scissors threading needle stitch markers measurements needed m1 width of the body - shoulder to shoulder plus twice for 3/4 sleeves write that measurement here __________ = m1 m2 desired neck opening write that measurement here __________= m2 m3 waist opening - half of waist circumference write that measurement here __________= m3 m4 shrug length - shoulder to under bust write that measurement here __________= m4 *see the graphic to guide your measurement *those figures are a guide you can customize your measurement to your own preferences 3 stitch used chain number multiple of 6 + 2 chain 24 + 2 26ch - starting chain for swatch row1 ch2 counts as a double_crochet double_crochet into the 4th chain from the hook ch4 skip 4chs 2dcs *ch4 skip 4chs 2dcs* repeat 2 more times turn row2 ch4 counts as a double_crochet and ch2 2dc in 4ch space *ch4 2dc on 4ch space* repeat 2 more time chain 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet chain 2 from prev row row3 ch2 counts as a double_crochet double_crochet in ch2 space *ch4 2dc in next ch4 space* repeat 2 more times ch4 double_crochet in ch2 space double_crochet in last double_crochet ch2 from prev row *repeat row 2 and 3 as many time as needed to reach desired length row 1 ch2 double_crochet into 4th chain from the hook ch4 skip 4 double_crochet double_crochet in next st ch4 skip 4 double_crochet double_crochet in next st 4 row 2 ch4 double_crochet into chain space double_crochet into chain space ch4 double_crochet into chain space double_crochet into chain space ch4 row 3 chain double_crochet
